```{r}
library(alr4)
data("oldfaith")
x<-oldfaith$Duration
y<-oldfaith$Interval
mod<-lm(y~x,data=oldfaith)
summary(mod)

```
```{r}
scatterplot(x,y)
newy<-data.frame(x=c(250))
predict(mod,newdata = newy, interval="prediction", level=0.95)
```

```{r}

playbill <- read.csv("playbill.csv")
mod<- lm(playbill$CurrentWeek ~ playbill$LastWeek, data=playbill)

```

```{r}
plot(playbill$CurrentWeek,playbill$LastWeek)
abline(mod)
```
```{r}
conflicts(mod)
summary(mod)
```
```{r}
newy<-data.frame(x=c(250))
predict(mod,newdata = newy, interval="prediction", level=0.95)
```
